titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Student Financial Aid Awareness Month to raise awareness of student financial aid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Mr. Bishop (NY) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1353.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/25/2010--Passed House amended. Supports the goals and ideals of Student Financial Aid Awareness Month.
